description:
Taxable turnover: supplies and services

Explanatory notes for the following statistics:
73311 Turnover tax statistics (advance returns)
73321 Turnover tax statistics (assessments)

Definition:
Supplies and services as defined in turnover tax statistics
(advance returns and assessments) are output, which - also
in terms of tax law - is referred to as supplies, other
services and own consumption of the enterprises; in short,
"supplies and services". Supplies and services are part of
taxable turnover. Taxable turnover as defined in Section 1
of the Turnover Tax Law also includes the importation from
EU Member States (intra-Community acquisition) and from non-
EU Member States (turnover which is subject to import
turnover tax). The "supplies and services" shown do not
contain turnover tax.


© Statistisches Bundesamt, Wiesbaden 2015
name: Taxable turnover: supplies and services
